thread.title: Man hit by van at ATM dies | UTV - ITV News
thread.title_full: Man hit by van at ATM dies | UTV - ITV News

title: Man hit by van at ATM dies | UTV - ITV News
text:
23 February 2017 at 2:51pm Man hit by van at ATM dies Credit: Google maps 
A 63-year-old man has died after being struck by a van, while withdrawing money from an ATM on Larne's Main Street. 
The collision occurred on Wednesday morning, shortly before 8.25am. 
A blue Vauxhall Vivaro van that had been parked on the street was reported to have rolled back and hit the man. 
He was taken to hospital for treatment for a suspected broken leg, but he passed away in hospital on Thursday morning. 
Police are appealing for anyone who was on Main Street yesterday morning and who witnessed the van or the collision to contact local officers in Larne or the Collision Investigation Unit on 101 quoting reference number 189 of 22/02/17. Last updated Thu 23 Feb 2017
